short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can play a maze generation game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you open the extension, you will be shown a maze game and a completely random maze will be generated.

Instructions:

- You can complete the maze by moving the small blue ball with the arrow keys or WASD.
- Above there are three variables, two of them (size and difficulty) have a slider so you can modify the values ​​to your liking, which will alter the formation of the maze, making it bigger, smaller, more difficult or easier; the other shows you a timer that starts when you start a new game.
- Every time you reach the red circle, you will complete the maze and it will restart.
- Press the "New Maze" button, R or SPACE to restart the maze.
